'Comb binding' (sometimes referred to as "cerlox or surelox binding") is one of
many ways to bind pages together into a book. This method utilizes round plastic
spines with 19 rings (for US Letter size) or 21 rings (for A4 size) and a hole
puncher that makes rectangular holes. Comb binding is sometimes referred to as
plastic comb binding or spiral comb binding.
